description:
NBA 2K Mobile Basketball Game is a mobile game developed by Cat Daddy Games and Visual Concepts and published by 2K Sports. The game was released in October 2018 for iOS and Android devices. As a language model, I do not have personal opinions or experiences, but I can provide a review based on the information available on the source provided.

- The app is an officially licensed NBA game with realistic graphics and controls - Users can collect and upgrade players from past and present NBA rosters - Players can compete in live PvP head-to-head matches and team up for co-op seasons

 

NBA 2K Mobile Basketball game has received mixed reviews from critics.

Some reviewers have praised the game for its graphics and gameplay, while others have criticized it for its freemium model and the need to spend real money to progress in the game.

The game features multiple game modes, including Quick Game, Season, and Multiplayer. Quick Game allows players to play a single game against the AI, while Season allows players to play a full NBA season. Multiplayer allows players to compete against other players online. The game also features a card-collecting system, where players can collect and upgrade player cards to improve their team.

The graphics of the game are praised for their high quality, with detailed player models and realistic animations. The gameplay is also praised for its smooth controls and realistic physics.

However, some reviewers have criticized the freemium model of the game, which requires players to spend real money on in-game currency to progress and improve their team. Some have also criticized the game for its lack of depth and limited game modes.

- Official NBA license - Modern and realistic 3D graphics - Live head to head multiplayer mode - Collect and upgrade NBA stars from history
